```{r, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')

Oral <- read_xlsx('IcoLL2026review.xlsx') %>% 
  filter(Type == 'Oral') %>% 
  select(Author, Title, Theme, Day, Room, Session) %>% 
  mutate(AuthorTitle = paste0(Title, " (", Author, ")")) %>% 
  mutate(ThemeAuthorTitle = paste0("[", Theme, "] ", AuthorTitle)) %>% 
  select(ThemeAuthorTitle, Day, Room, Session) %>% 
  group_by(Day, Room, Session) %>% 
  mutate(Order = row_number()) %>% 
  arrange(Day, Room, Session, Order) %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = Room, values_from = ThemeAuthorTitle) %>% 
  rename(`Room 1` = `1`, `Room 2` = `2`, `Room 3` = `3`, `Room 4` = `4`)

Program <- read_xlsx('IcoLL2026program.xlsx') %>% 
  left_join(Oral, by = c('Day', 'Session', 'Order')) %>% 
  select(-Session, -Order)

Poster <- read_xlsx('IcoLL2026review.xlsx') %>% 
  filter(Type == 'Poster') %>% 
  select(Author, Title, Day) %>% 
  arrange(Day, Title, Author) %>% 
  mutate(`Title (Author)` = paste0(Title, " (", Author, ")")) %>% 
  select(-Author, -Title)

Day1 <- Program %>% 
  filter(Day == 1) %>% 
  select(-Day)

Day2 <- Program %>% 
  filter(Day == 2) %>% 
  select(-Day)

Day3 <- Program %>% 
  filter(Day == 3) %>% 
  select(-Day)
```
